title: Texas sues Volkswagen, Audi over diesel emissions cheating
text:
Texas sues Volkswagen, Audi over diesel emissions cheating 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
If things weren't bad enough for the Volkswagen Group already, Texas is taking aim at at the world's largest automaker and filed suit agains...
